data.title: Lobozzo Alumni House
data.meta_description: The Joseph M. Lobozzo Alumni House is an ideal space to host intimate gatherings or spacious events of up to 120 people.
data.text:
Comfortably seats up to four guests

Provides a warm, quiet place for visitors to unwind or partake in an intimate conversation

Yearbooks ranging from 1912 to 1993 are available to view

Contains books about RIT’s Campus, as well as books written by alumni

Excellent natural lighting

Ideal for one-on-one meetings

Seats up to 12 guests

Option to use installed electric privacy glass which minimized outside intrusion

Dimmable lights that create a warm and inviting atmosphere

Ability to connect laptop to the 60” TV via provided HDMI cord

Holds up to 24 guests

Music capability through use of Bluetooth or provided plugin

Fireplace provides a warm and inviting atmosphere

Mirror above the fireplace that doubles as a TV

Ability to connect laptop to the TV via provided HDMI cord

Dimmable lights that create a warm and inviting atmosphere

Built in bar that RIT Catering uses to serve alcohol in a more upscale manner

Direct access to the LeChase Construction Alumni Patio

Excellent relaxation and lounge space

Two windows that open to allow the perfect Rochester breeze

Holds up to 14 guests

Three seasons room

17 windows that open to allow the perfect Rochester breeze

Ability to see wildlife from the wooded area

Dimmable lights that create a warm and inviting atmosphere

Direct access to the LeChase Construction Alumni Patio

Seats up to 72 guests

Versatile space that allows for unique setups, including standing receptions, seated events, and theater style seating

Two 86” TVs in the front of the room and one 70” TV in the back of the room

Wireless computer connection that mirrors computer display on all three TVs

Podium with plug-in capabilities to project to the two front displays

Sound system with music capability

Microphone to enhance speaker performance

Dimmable lights that create a warm and inviting atmosphere

Direct access to the LeChase Construction Alumni Patio

Holds up to 80 guests

Built in fire pit that is perfect year round for roasting s’mores

Sound system with music capability

Patio furniture that can accommodate guests to sit around two tables, while others are resting around the fire

Direct access to the Alumni Association Boardroom, Buckingham Lounge & Surace Bar, and the Janicki Conservatory
